body_html:
After the installation using conda install pytorch with regression examples the same stack trace error occurs this is the case message:

Traceback (most recent call last):
File "main.py", line 5, in
import torch
File "/media/kaique/756ecb3f-4df3-4151-8967-572e968ec005/anaconda3/envs/chap/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/init.py", line 56, in

ImportError: /media/kaique/756ecb3f-4df3-4151-8967-572e968ec005/anaconda3/envs/chap/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: nvrtcGetProgramLogSize

body:
After the installation using `conda install pytorch` with `regression` examples the same stack trace error occurs this is the case message:

Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "main.py", line 5, in <module>
    import torch
  File "/media/kaique/756ecb3f-4df3-4151-8967-572e968ec005/anaconda3/envs/chap/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/__init__.py", line 56, in <module>
    from torch._C import *
ImportError: /media/kaique/756ecb3f-4df3-4151-8967-572e968ec005/anaconda3/envs/chap/lib/python3.6/site-packages/torch/_C.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: undefined symbol: nvrtcGetProgramLogSize
